Main: ^Lost memours office, my name is John, how may I help you?

g-0: ^I... I lost my camera, this is the last place im checking, I cant go home without my camera
^Oh don't worry, can you tell me how is your camera, maybe I have it here
g-1: ^I'ts a little pink polaroid, was my mum's, it's everything i have left °sobs°
^I think I got it, would this camera check out?
g-2: ^Someone brought it not long ago, good thing you came here
g-3: ^Thank you so much sir, you saved me
^The kindness of a stranger saved your camera

St1: ^Do you need help with something else?

c-0: ^No, they won't be coming soon, I promised to keep all their photos safe, so my sis and I can remember them
g-0: ^Not really, thank again you so much sir, take care

b: ^I'm so sorry, this city truly forgets no one, plase take care boy

s: ^Have a good one boy, be safe
